description: Responsible for scheduling all exams related to Imaging Services and the Breast Center. Ability to perform all clerical and telephone functions related to the Central Scheduling Section of Imaging Services. This position requires the full understanding and active participation in fulfilling the mission of AHMC Anaheim Regional Medical Center and AHMC. It is expected that the employee demonstrate behavior consistent with the core values of AHMC. The employee shall support Anaheim Regional Medical Center’s strategic plan and goals and direction of the performance improvement plan. The employee will also be expected to support all organizational expectations including, but not limited to; Customer Service, Patient’s Rights, Confidentiality of Information, Environment of Care and AHMC initiatives. Three to five years experience as a patient scheduler, preferably in radiology scheduling. Bilingual preferred.
responsibilities: Responsible for scheduling all exams related to Imaging Services and the Breast Center. Ability to perform all clerical and telephone functions related to the Central Scheduling Section of Imaging Services.
